name: PilotQuizQuestionsForFlightReviews
0:
”Alexa open pilot quiz”
”ask question”
”close pilot quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pilot quiz
des: Over 100 common flight review questions to help you ace your next flight review or simply keep your piloting knowledge up-to-date. This skill simulates the verbal portion of an actual flight review with both questions and then answers provided after you attempt an answer. Questions are multiple choice to give you hints about what the answer may be, however, answers still require a detailed knowledge of all common flight review topics.
